title: Hackers with Conti cybercrime group are repurposing tools for attacks on Ukraine
description: Researchers from Google and IBM see unprecedented blurring of lines.

title: Hands-on with the Apple Watch Ultra and AirPods Pro
description: Plus glimpses of the updated Apple Watch SE and Apple Watch Series 8.

title: Here’s a first look at the iPhone 14 and iPhone 14 Pro
description: The iPhone 14 looks the same, but the 14 Pro offers an alternative to the notch.

title: Juul settles massive nationwide probe into youth vaping for $438.5M
description: The once dominant e-cig company faces yet more legal challenges and FDA scrutiny.

description: Dealmaster includes MacBook Pros, Google Nest Hubs, Apple Watches, and more.

title: Apple Watch Series 3, dead in all but name, now actually dead
description: Gone, but probably not too soon: Apple's weirdly old, slightly discounted Watch.

title: Sony calls Microsoft’s 3-year Call of Duty sharing offer “inadequate”
description: PlayStation CEO says Microsoft "undermines the principle" of cross-platform access.

title: There’s no iPhone 14 mini, but the iPhone 13 mini lives to fight another day
description: Persistent reports of poor sales mean small-screened phones are vanishingly rare.

title: Google Maps can now pick the most efficient route for EVs
description: Previously, Google Maps' "efficient" routes were only for gas vehicles.

title: Scientists glean new insights into how tardigrades can survive dehydration
description: Proteins form gel-like filaments that stiffen into networks to support dried-out cells.

title: New wave of data-destroying ransomware attacks hits QNAP NAS devices
description: DeadBolt has already infected thousands of QNAP storage devices this year.

description: Interactive map makes it easier to track security threats from state to state.

title: iOS 16 launches September 12
description: New iPhone software will bring lock screen changes, passkeys, and app updates.

title: iPhone 14 Pro and iPhone 14 Pro Max ditch the notch—sort of
description: Bigger cameras and a notch-less design headline Apple's flagships.

description: There's not much new here compared to 2021, to be honest.

title: Second-generation AirPods Pro use new H2 chip, enhanced noise cancellation and spatial audio features
description: Apple's in-ear headphones get their first update since their 2019 debut.

description: Brightest Apple Watch display yet, plus aerospace titanium case, built-in cellular.

title: New Apple Watches unveiled with focus on health and safety
description: Lineup includes Apple Watch Ultra, Apple Watch Series 8, and Apple Watch SE.

title: AMD is making laptop CPU model numbers simultaneously less and more confusing
description: Numbers will accommodate a range of new CPUs that sometimes use older Zen cores.

description: After hearing, judge rejects Musk request to delay Twitter trial by four weeks.

title: Developer creates delightful programming font based on Minecraft
description: "The font for developers who like Minecraft a bit too much."

title: Surgeons performed a successful amputation 31,000 years ago in Borneo
description: The skeleton of an individual known as Tebo 1 dates to around 31,000 years old.

title: Efforts to ID Tulsa race massacre victims raise privacy issues
description: Project uses genealogy website that can be accessed by law enforcement.

title: Are Hawaii’s beach showers in violation of the Clean Water Act?
description: Showers likely a “point source” of sunscreen contamination and a threat to coral reefs.

title: Splatoon 3 review: Nintendo’s well of squid ink has run dry
description: Nintendo's "coolest" series has run out of fresh ideas, both online and off.

title: With BA.5 boosters, Biden officials herald the start of annual COVID shots
description: Officials hope booster uptake will at least match seasonal flu shot coverage.
